description:
I'm not a fan of markdown-based note-taking software because the markdown syntax doesn't allow for complex styles.
Siyuan is a great alternative.
summary: A note-taking app that is very impressive

description: This logs everything on your system which takes tens of gigs then more into path /run/user/1000/doc/by-app/org.b3log.siyuan (ALSO it does not work anyway, whatever workspace you choose on launch it rejects with lame excuse that it is in rsync path! Even external storage! Very malware-ish behavior, the screenshots seem to be mockups similar to obsidian to entice to install. Beware!
summary: logs Gigs of your activity suspiciously & Does NOT WORK anyway

description: Tried to install twice, open the welcome page but after selecting the location loads for a while then closes. Had better experience with the docker version.

获取内核服务端口失败 Failed to get kernel serve port。
Failed to get kernel serve port, please make sure the program has network permissions and is not blocked by firewalls and antivirus software.
summary: 获取内核服务端口失败 Failed to get kernel serve port
